    <dd><p>Period, currently only 86400 is supported.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="start_time_python">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#start_time_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">start_<wbr>time</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Protection Overview Attack Trend Start Time.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="type_python">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#type_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Attack type: cc, ddos.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="result_output_file_python">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#result_output_file_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">result_<wbr>output_<wbr>file</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Used to save results.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#periodpointcount_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">period<wbr>Point<wbr>Count</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Number</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Number of period points included.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span id="starttime_yaml">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd></dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span id="type_yaml">

    </dt>
    <dd></dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">

</pulumi-choosable>
</div>
